description: Working at our dream company- Isn't that a dream we all have ‚Äº Wish you could interact with Mentors from the Industry, who've been there, accomplished their goals and are doing what they love ‚ùì.Join us on 25th November for the first edition of Mentor Connect with Mr. Aravind Panicker, Application Engineer at Google.

name: Finding your true passion
speaker: Ann Andrews
description: The impact that a proper career choice could have on your life in monumental. Still on the search for your true passion? Join us for Mentor Connect on 2nd December, at 8:00 PM and listen to Ann Andrews, Founder - Techfunic, as she shares some tips to help you find your true passion.
